The general idea of the Student Government Association SGAs campaign  was to gain interest spark dialogue and create an atmosphere of respect and understanding PERIOD

At the center of the debate is cultural appropriation PERIOD The SGAs event page defines cultural appropriation as Our CultureYou must be a crazy selfcentered person if you agree with culturally specific costumes but you are a racist if you do not believe cultural appropriation is true or see its impacts.a MexicanunderstandWasnt everything just so much easier when everyone dressed up as cows pumpkins princesses or knights and we did not even know what it meant to belittle a culture we knew nothing about

Yeah PERIOD Back when we dressed up as European princesses and knights disregarding their existence in other countries and reducing medieval Europe to the unrepresentative nobility which was never had a uniform outfit and whose identities were highly tied up in the armor and dress they wore PERIOD Yeah that cultural appropriation and stereotyping was great PERIOD
